text:
Well, yes. While you might be struggling with your 9-5 job, Capuchin monkey of Hollywood has made her big Bollywood debut in Total Dhamaal alongside stars like Ajay Devgn, Anil Kapoor, Madhuri Dixit-Nene, Riteish Deshmukh and Arshad Warsi.
And Gully Boy, it is said, is roughly inspired by the real-life stories of rappers Divine and Naezy. It’s not a biopic, it is a fictional story, Zoya Akhtar recently revealed adding that the movie is inspired by underground rappers Divine and Naezy.
In his debut episode on the chat show, Ranveer had described how he was floored by Kareena Kapoor Khan's beauty when she would come to a club for swimming. "I went from child to boy", he said in the clip while describing his feelings to see Kareena swim.
Speaking to a leading daily, DNA, Kangana looks back at her past experiences and says, “People were trying to put me behind bars, can you believe that? They should make a film on my life also (laughs uncontrollably).”

"Today, 5 years after his diagnosis, Ayaan has been declared cancer free. It has been quite a journey. Thank you for all your prayers and wishes. Love and prayers for all the cancer fighters out there, hope and belief go a long way. You can WIN this battle !!! #thekissoflife"
title: Meet The Real Life Gully Boys, Kangana Says She Felt Suffocated In Bollywood & More From Ent.
